menuItems.name: Breakfast combo
menuItems.description: 2 fried eggs, 2 sausages, 2 bacon strips, baked beans, home fries and toast
reviews: Best services yet!. The meals are on point!
Restorative and pleasing to taste!
This 'English Breakfast' style tea is quite satisfying and has a rich flavor that is quite delicious.

menuItems.name: Burgers
menuItems.description: Includes 400gm of beef, well toasted bun, a choice of bacon strips, omelette, ham, all or none. A choice of cheese or none.
reviews: Had me licking my fingers for a minute there.
Indulge your taste buds with puzzles burgers.

menuItems.name: Pizza
menuItems.description: Chicken tikka, cheese, green pepper, pizza sauce.
reviews: Must be the pizza
Tasty and cheesy.
It's perfect for cheese lovers and is a reasonable price!

menuItems.name: Ribs
menuItems.description: 800g rib section, honey or chilli BBQ.
reviews: It's finger-licking good.
If you are looking to enjoy the grills, you came to the right place.

menuItems.name: Biryani
reviews: Value for money definetly.
Amazing experience, satisfied my cravings.

menuItems.name: Choma
reviews: Very affordable choma and can be made to your liking.
Quite robust and genuine african restaurant

menuItems.name: Beef lovers platter.
menuItems.description: Cured meat, olives, pilau, biryani, chapati and sauce.
reviews: Those chapati's touched my soul.
The goat of city restaurants

menuItems.name: Chicken lovers platter.
reviews: Great food, good value. My go to place.
Best for on the way pick up and go.

menuItems.name: Milk shakes.
reviews: Favorite drink for a hot day.
Vanilla anyday anytime

menuItems.name: Cocktails.
reviews: I don't remeber anything!!
Smooth and crisp as I like them!
A river of joy.
Beep beep you're drunk
